targets.query:
from(bucket: "network")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "bandwidth" and r.direction == "rx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device_name =~ /LGwebOSTV|TCLRokuTV|iPhone|iPad|Mac|QRSCUBE|Tonal|Marantz/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 1000000)
  |> group(columns: ["device_name"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 8.0 / 10.0}))

from(bucket: "network")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "bandwidth" and r.direction == "rx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device_name =~ /LGwebOSTV|TCLRokuTV|iPhone|iPad|Mac|QRSCUBE|Tonal|Marantz/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 8.0 / 10.0}))

import "strings"

from(bucket: "network")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "dns_query" and r._field == "domain")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device_name =~ /LGwebOSTV|TCLRokuTV|iPhone|iPad|Mac|QRSCUBE|Tonal|Marantz/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value =~ /netflix|disney|amazon.*video|hulu|hbo|youtube|twitch|spotify|apple.*tv|paramount|peacock|pluto|akamai|fastly|cloudfront/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with 
      service: if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "netflix") then "Netflix"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "disney") then "Disney+"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "amazon") then "Prime Video"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "youtube") then "YouTube"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "hulu") then "Hulu"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "hbo") then "HBO Max"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "twitch") then "Twitch"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "spotify") then "Spotify"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "apple") then "Apple TV+"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "paramount") then "Paramount+"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "peacock") then "Peacock"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "pluto") then "Pluto TV"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "akamai") then "CDN: Akamai"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "fastly") then "CDN: Fastly"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "cloudfront") then "CDN: CloudFront"
        else "Other"
    }))
  |> group(columns: ["device_name", "service"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)

import "strings"

from(bucket: "network")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "dns_query" and r._field == "domain")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device_name =~ /LGwebOSTV|TCLRokuTV|iPhone|iPad|Mac|QRSCUBE|Tonal|Marantz/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value =~ /akamai|fastly|cloudfront|cdn|limelight|edgecast/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with 
      cdn: if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "akamai") then "Akamai"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "fastly") then "Fastly"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "cloudfront") then "CloudFront"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "limelight") then "Limelight"
        else if strings.containsStr(v: r._value, substr: "edgecast") then "Edgecast"
        else "Other CDN"
    }))
  |> group(columns: ["device_name", "cdn"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "network")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "bandwidth" and r.direction == "rx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device_name =~ /LGwebOSTV|TCLRokuTV|iPhone|iPad|Mac|QRSCUBE|Tonal|Marantz/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 8.0 / 5.0}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with stall: if r._value < 1000000.0 and r._value > 100000.0 then r._value else 0.0}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.stall > 0.0)

from(bucket: "network")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "bandwidth" and r.direction == "rx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device_name =~ /LGwebOSTV|TCLRokuTV|iPhone|iPad|Mac|QRSCUBE|Tonal|Marantz/)
  |> group(columns: ["device_name"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 1024.0 / 1024.0 / 1024.0}))
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 10)

from(bucket: "network")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "connection_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device_name =~ /LGwebOSTV|TCLRokuTV|iPhone|iPad|Mac|QRSCUBE|Tonal|Marantz/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.state == "ESTABLISHED" or r.state == "ACTIVE")
  |> group(columns: ["device_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "network")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "dns_query" and r._field == "domain")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.device_name =~ /LGwebOSTV|TCLRokuTV|iPhone|iPad|Mac|QRSCUBE|Tonal|Marantz/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value =~ /netflix|disney|amazon|hulu|hbo|youtube|twitch|spotify|apple.*tv|paramount|peacock|pluto/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "device_name", "_value", "query_type"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 100)
